easy.question: Which team won three Super Bowls between 2001 and 2004?
easy.hint: They were led by quarterback Tom Brady and coach Bill Belichick.

easy.question: Which quarterback was nicknamed 'A-Rod'?
easy.hint: This Green Bay Packers star won Super Bowl XLV and multiple MVP awards.

easy.question: Which team won Super Bowl LIV in 2020?
easy.hint: They were led by quarterback Patrick Mahomes and defeated the 49ers.

easy.question: Which player holds the NFL record for most passing yards in a single season?
easy.hint: He threw for 5,477 yards for the Denver Broncos in 2013.

easy.question: Which team relocated from St. Louis to Los Angeles in 2016?
easy.hint: They had previously moved from Los Angeles to St. Louis in 1995.

medium.question: Which team had a perfect 16-0 regular season in 2007?
medium.hint: They eventually lost in the Super Bowl to the New York Giants.

medium.question: Which quarterback threw for 7 touchdowns in a single game in 2013?
medium.hint: He accomplished this in the season opener against the Baltimore Ravens.

medium.question: Which player made the 'Helmet Catch' in Super Bowl XLII?
medium.hint: This miraculous catch helped the Giants upset the undefeated Patriots.

medium.question: Which player returned a missed field goal 109 yards for a touchdown in 2013?
medium.hint: This Auburn cornerback did it against Alabama in the Iron Bowl, known as the 'Kick Six.'

medium.question: Which quarterback spent his entire 14-year career with the San Diego/Los Angeles Chargers?
medium.hint: He was drafted in 2004 in the same class as Eli Manning and Ben Roethlisberger.

hard.question: Which team selected Giovanni Carmazzi in the 2000 NFL Draft, passing on Tom Brady?
hard.hint: They selected him in the third round, while Brady went to the Patriots in the sixth round.

hard.question: Which player caught the 'Fail Mary' controversial touchdown in 2012?
hard.hint: This controversial call by replacement referees ended a Seahawks-Packers game.

hard.question: Which player scored a 99-yard touchdown reception against the Jets in 2018?
hard.hint: This Titans running back tied the NFL record for the longest play from scrimmage.

hard.question: Which coach was fired after going 14-2 in the 2006 season?
hard.hint: This Chargers coach was fired after a playoff loss despite the team's excellent record.

hard.question: Which player had the longest field goal in NFL history at 66 yards in 2021?
hard.hint: This Ravens kicker hit this field goal as time expired against the Lions.
